title: Discord Moderation
body:
Hello!

With the launch of Discord moderation in General Discussion, we’re expanding the service to Gameplay. The main functionality for this channel is to help have direct communication to moderators on the Boards regarding discussions/posts that break our Universal Rules. We’ll still be actioning normally if reported through the existing reporting method but this gives an extended avenue that players can use if they would like to give a more detailed report.

We’ll need you to register first in our Discord verification thread [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/oANjm0W4-discord-verification) and the moderators will get you setup in our channel. When you want to report, head over to #gameplayreports and use @moderators ONLY and a moderator will pull you into their room to discuss the report privately. Do note that this feature is a privilege and access will be removed if abused.
